title: Commercial Property For Sale
details:
Details of Property

Extent of Land - 10 Perches
3 Story Building - Ground and First Floor , Second Floor
1600 sqft each floor
Facing Marine Drive
Final Price for Full Property - 150 Million

Condition - Ground Floor is Leased out till Nov 2019. It will be transferred and will need to be carried forward by new buyer. New buyer will get 180,000 monthly rent for this year and next year 200,000 per month.
